name: Essential Cambridge Free Walking Tour (Available in Spanish)
description:
We will travel Cambridge for 2 hours. We will know the most visited places and also the less traveled ones. We will talk about the most emblematic buildings of the City and I will try very hard in what you understand the concept of the university because it is not easy being the 4th most important University in the World ranking. You will know all the rules and traditions that revolve around this prestigious institution, which are not few. If you want to know all the History at first hand, you have to do a tour with me because there are no details about the University, what can I resist or books where to find this information. What are we going to visit? 1.- Market Hill 2.- St. Mary's Church 3.- Old School, Senate House, Gonville & amp; Caius College 4.-King's College 5.-St Eduard's alley 6.-Eagle 7.-St Benet's and Corpus Clock 8.-St Botolph's Church 9- Pembroke College 12.-Mathematical Bridge 12.-Backs Rio Cam 13.-Claire College 14.- Trinity College 15.- St. John's College 16.- Round church Come to Cambridge and enjoy my Free Walking Tour of this awesome city!

Free tour: Book for free and pay what you want at the end

name: Free walking tour of Cambridge (in Italian, Spanish, English) (Available in English, Spanish, Italian)
description:
IMPORTANT: Please leave a phone number when booking. We begin our tours at Market Hill, which we will walk for 2 hours through the beautiful streets of Cambridge. We will visit several colleges such as Kings College, Pembroke College. Queens College, Gonville and Caiuss, Trinity College, St John's College. We also pass famous places such as the Adlerkneipe, the Mathematical Bridge, the University Library and much more. I will try to summarize 2000 years of history in 2 hours in a way that you will remember. It will be interesting, fun and different. The free walking tours do not include the fees that some colleges charge to visit, but I will share tips on how to visit them for FREE. I can't wait to see you guys ;)

Free tour: Book for free and pay what you want at the end
